aws:cdk:cloudformation:props.description: Emits metrics about environments status for every pool
Periodically runs the environments monitor function (atmosphere-integ-allocate/Atmosphere/Environments/Monitor/Function)
Emits metrics about allocations status for every pool
Periodically runs the allocations monitor function (atmosphere-integ-allocate/Atmosphere/Allocations/Monitor/Function)
